explanation: To determine if lfs_mkdir participates in direct or indirect recursion you must inspect lfs_mkdir_ (the immediate callee) and every function it calls (and their transitive callees). Each listed symbol is a direct callee of lfs_mkdir_ according to the static call graph; their implementations or call-graphs must be examined to see whether any of them (possibly via further calls) call back to lfs_mkdir or lfs_mkdir_ and thus create a recursion cycle. In short: lfs_mkdir_ to inspect the immediate call, and the other functions to check for any path returning to lfs_mkdir/lfs_mkdir_ (indirect recursion).
